description: Module for setup of Gslb Avi RESTful Object

username.description: Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).

api_version.description: Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.

description.description: User defined description for the object.

state.description: The state that should be applied on the entity.

url.description: Avi controller URL of the object.

view_id.description: The view-id is used in maintenance mode to differentiate partitioned groups while they havethe same gslb namespace. Each partitioned groupwill be able to operate independently by using theview-id. Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 0.

tenant_ref.description: It is a reference to an object of type tenant.

sites.description: Select avi site member belonging to this gslb.

controller.description: IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).

send_interval.description: Frequency with which group members communicate. Allowed values are 1-3600. Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 15.

clear_on_max_retries.description: Max retries after which the remote site is treatedas a fresh start. In fresh start all the configsare downloaded. Allowed values are 1-1024. Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 20.

dns_configs.description: Sub domain configuration for the gslb. Gslb service's fqdn must be a match one of these subdomains.

leader_cluster_uuid.description: Mark this site as leader of gslb configuration. This site is the one among the avi sites.

tenant_uuid.description: UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.

password.description: Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).

client_ip_addr_group.description: Group to specify if the client ip addresses are public or private. Field introduced in 17.1.2.

third_party_sites.description: Third party site member belonging to this gslb. Field introduced in 17.1.1.

tenant.description: Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
